text: Syed Imdad Imam Asar Nawab was an Indian poet, writer, and critic who lived in Patna, Bihar, from 17 August 1849 until 17 October 1933. He was professor of History and Arabic in Patna College. == References == Category:1849 births Category:1933 deaths Category:People from Gaya district
title: Imdad Imam Asar
